short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Wise Search extension to search the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wise Search chrome extension by Aztec configures your Default Search setting to blpsearch.com 

Please read carefully:  By clicking the “Add to Chrome” button in the top right hand corner above and installing the Wise Search chrome extension, you agree to install this extension which will change your chrome default search settings to: blpsearch.com , and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. 

End User License Agreement:   https://www.blpsearch.com/terms

Privacy Policy: https://www.blpsearch.com/privacy


To remove wise search extension from Google Chrome any time:

1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the wise search extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
